name: Black White Bear
description:
To Play:

Left Mouse Button - Computer browser

Your finger - Mobile browser

Inspirations:

The Westerners refused to believe the panda specimen Missionary Armand David sent from China to Europe because they never heard of any bear that can have such a unique black-n-white fur pattern before 1869. Even if that creature existed on this planet way earlier than they were born. 

A similar social phenomenon of public ignorance also appeared in modern society when it comes to LGBT+ and diversity topics.

Game Narrative:

Baby Panda was found on a river bank next to a mountain village of pure color bears. The aunty bear adopted the baby and protected it from discrimination and attack. After Baby Panda grew up, it decided to leave the village, find its own identity or anyone similar, and face challenges from the outside world.

(Baby Panda and most characters in this game don't have a specific gender, no matter what color their fur is)

Future Goals:

  • 4 chapters, 12 mini-games/puzzles
